CLIs: username <user-name> prefix-string [ 128 chars max ] [ accounting-server-policy <policy-name> ] [ authentication-server-policy <policy-name> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the user name. Values-1 to 32.
Specifies the prefix-string for the association. Values-128 characters, maximum.
Specifies the default accounting RADIUS server policy up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the default authentication RADIUS server policy up to 32 characters in length.
